translations: n.双人自行车；串联工作组
adv.二马（或多马）纵列的；协同地
n.（Tandem）（俄、印、乌、荷、法、德）坦德姆（人名）

phrs.translation: adv. 一前一后地；协力地
串联加速器；串列式加速器

sentences.sentence: And they would form one of the top rebounding tandems in the league.
sentences.translation: 他们还会是联盟里数一数二的篮板组合。

sentences.sentence: Recumbent bicycles, tandems, and other bicycles will be considered non-conforming and not allowed to enter any race.
sentences.translation: 躺车、三轮车和其他种类的自行车将被视为不合规则，不允许参加任何比赛。
